text: Sarrebourg (; , Lorraine Franconian: Saarbuerj) is a commune in the Moselle department in Grand Est in north-eastern France. It lies in on the upper course of the river Saar. In 1895 a Mithraeum was discovered at Sarrebourg at the mouth of the pass leading from the Vosges Mountains. Category:1661 disestablishments Category:Communes of Moselle (department) Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Sarrebourg
